200.description: The request was successful. Code was downloaded.

403.description: The caller does not have proper access to this API

default.description: Error response describing the reason for operation failure. The request failed.

message.description: Error message describing the error in detail.

target.description: The target of the particular error.

ErrorResponse.description: Error response indicates that the service is not able to process the incoming request. The reason is provided in the error message.
